caption.center: IN RE MERRILL LYNCH, PIERCE, FENNER SMITH, INC., Relator.

court.center: Court of Appeals of Texas, Fourteenth District, Houston.

opinion.panel: Panel consists of Justices YATES, ANDERSON, and BROWN.
opinion.opinion_text:
On May 9, 2008, relator filed a petition for writ of mandamus, asking this Court to order the respondent[fn1] to vacate an amended show cause order. On June 10, 2008, relator moved to dismiss its mandamus proceeding because the real party in interest withdrew the motion to show cause in the underlying suit. The motion to dismiss is granted.
[fn1] The Honorable Mike Wood, Judge of Probate Court Number Two, Harris County, Texas
